mapper.select:
select a.SupplierID, a.SupplierName, a.SupplierShortName, a.Address, a.Character, a.Type, a.WebSite, a. Person1Name, a.Person1Phone1, a.Person1Phone2, a.Person1Email, a.Person2Name, a.Person2Phone1, a. Person2Phone2, a.Person2Email, a.SupplierLevel, a.BankName, a.BankNumber, a.OrganizationCode, a. TaxCode, a.Manager, a.Memo, a.CreateUserID, a.IfAudited, a.IfDeleted,b.dict_label, '' as TypeName, '' LevelName from SRM_SupplierInfo a left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type='单位性质') b on a.Character=b.dict_value where 0=0
AND a.ifdeleted = #{ifdeleted, jdbcType=BIT}
AND a.suppliername like concat('%', #{suppliername, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
order by a.SupplierID desc

select a.SupplierID, a.SupplierName, a.SupplierShortName, a.Address, a.Character, a.Type, a.WebSite, a. Person1Name, a.Person1Phone1, a.Person1Phone2, a.Person1Email, a.Person2Name, a.Person2Phone1, a. Person2Phone2, a.Person2Email, a.SupplierLevel, a.BankName, a.BankNumber, a.OrganizationCode, a. TaxCode, a.Manager, a.Memo, a.CreateUserID, a.IfAudited, a.IfDeleted,b.dict_label, '' as TypeName, '' LevelName from SRM_SupplierInfo a left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type='单位性质') b on a.Character=b.dict_value where 0=0 and a.ifdeleted = 0
AND a.OrganizationCode = #{organizationcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.SupplierID, a.SupplierName, a.SupplierShortName, a.Address, a.Character, a.Type, a.WebSite, a. Person1Name, a.Person1Phone1, a.Person1Phone2, a.Person1Email, a.Person2Name, a.Person2Phone1, a. Person2Phone2, a.Person2Email, a.SupplierLevel, a.BankName, a.BankNumber, a.OrganizationCode, a. TaxCode, a.Manager, a.Memo, a.CreateUserID, a.IfAudited, a.IfDeleted,b.dict_label, '' as TypeName, '' LevelName, b.dict_label as characterLinkText, c.real_name as createUserIDLinkText from SRM_SupplierInfo a left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type='单位性质') b on a.Character=b.dict_value left join sys_user c on a.CreateUserID = c.user_id where a.SupplierID = #{supplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into SRM_SupplierInfo (SupplierName, SupplierShortName, Address, Character, Type, WebSite, Person1Name, Person1Phone1, Person1Phone2, Person1Email, Person2Name, Person2Phone1, Person2Phone2, Person2Email, SupplierLevel, BankName, BankNumber, OrganizationCode, TaxCode, Manager, Memo, CreateUserID, IfAudited, IfDeleted) values ( #{suppliername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suppliershortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{character,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{person1name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{person1phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{person1phone2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{person1email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{person2name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{person2phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{person2phone2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{person2email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierlevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{banknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ifaudited,jdbcType=BIT}, #{ifdeleted,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update SRM_SupplierInfo set SupplierName = #{suppliername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SupplierShortName = #{suppliershortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Character = #{character,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WebSite = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Person1Name = #{person1name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Person1Phone1 = #{person1phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Person1Phone2 = #{person1phone2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Person1Email = #{person1email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Person2Name = #{person2name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Person2Phone1 = #{person2phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Person2Phone2 = #{person2phone2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Person2Email = #{person2email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SupplierLevel = #{supplierlevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BankName = #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BankNumber = #{banknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OrganizationCode = #{organizationcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TaxCode = #{taxcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Manager = #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SupplierID = #{supplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select SupplierID, SupplierName, SupplierShortName, Address, Character, Type, WebSite, Person1Name, Person1Phone1, Person1Phone2, Person1Email, Person2Name, Person2Phone1, Person2Phone2, Person2Email, SupplierLevel, BankName, BankNumber, OrganizationCode, TaxCode, Manager, Memo, CreateUserID, IfAudited, IfDeleted from SRM_SupplierInfo where SupplierID = #{supplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select SupplierID, SupplierName, SupplierShortName, Address, Character, Type, WebSite, Person1Name, Person1Phone1, Person1Phone2, Person1Email, Person2Name, Person2Phone1, Person2Phone2, Person2Email, SupplierLevel, BankName, BankNumber, OrganizationCode, TaxCode, Manager, Memo, CreateUserID, IfAudited, IfDeleted from SRM_SupplierInfo
